level.heading: Applicability.
level.text: This subchapter shall apply to actions taken after July 13, 1998.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary addition of subchapter, see note to § 1-615.51.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-160, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-602.01.
